subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Kentucky Derby
Blacks
Horse Racing
Santa Anita Derby
lead_paragraph: If Kevin Krigger wins this year’s Kentucky Derby, he will become the first black jockey to take the honor since 1902. But Krigger is focused simply on winning the race.
snippet: If Kevin Krigger wins this year’s Kentucky Derby, he will become the first black jockey to take the honor since 1902. But Krigger is focused simply on winning the race.
